about_the_game:
In Tower and Sea DLC, the game introduces a brand-new card race – Human. This faction features the new hero Fool, along with 18 new Human cards, 8 unique treasures, and 5 new combat keywords. Explore engaging storylines and challenging dungeons related to this expansion for an enriched gaming experience.

New Card Race - Human


  • Human hero Fool
  • 18 new cards (each card with two forms)
  • 8 new treasures
  • New random NPC events
  • Human race storyline dungeons
  • Human race challenge dungeons

New Keywords


  • Fuse: One minion is temporarily integrated into another, giving the latter all the skills of the former (except Ranged and Dodge).
  • Sacrifice: You can feed it with minion cards in your hand to trigger the Sacrifice skill. After a certain number of times, it will be temporarily promoted to a higher grade.
  • Unite: Trigger this skill whenever a friendly card is summoned, or a minion card is sacrificed.
  • Conjure: Choose one of several cards and immediately use it.
  • Immortal: It will not die.

*DLC content can only be experienced after completing the S-level dungeon of the game itself and opening the S-level sealed gate.
